title: Julius Caesar
subtle:
Biography (nonfiction), 1,424 words, Level Y (Grade 5), Lexile 1040L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     S and Z2
description: Julius Caesar is ancient Rome's most famous dictator, but how did he earn such notoriety? Find out in this exciting biography that chronicles his military feats, rise to power, and inevitable fall.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
